about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are transforming customer service with AI technology
about.description: PylonChat is an innovative platform that helps businesses enhance customer experience with AI-powered chatbots.
about.missionText: Our goal is to enable businesses of all sizes to provide smart 24/7 support to their customers with advanced AI technology.
about.visionText: To be the global leader in AI-powered customer service and the most trusted partner in businesses' digital transformation journey.
about.innovationText: Offering continually evolving solutions using the latest AI technologies.
about.qualityText: Providing quality service to maximize customer satisfaction.
about.accessibilityText: Making AI technology accessible for everyone to use.
about.educationDesc: Expert AI consultant for overseas education, visa procedures, and language schools
about.ecommerceDesc: Smart customer service and sales assistant for online stores
about.teamDesc: The talented team bringing PylonChat to life
about.contactDesc: Have questions? Contact us for more information about PylonChat.
about.getStartedDesc: Create your free account and set up your AI chatbot in 5 minutes

pricing.title: Plans & Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the right plan for your business
pricing.portalError: Unable to open subscription portal. Please try again.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: Can I change my plan anytime?
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time. The upgrade is effective immediately.
faq.q2: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
faq.a2: If you cancel your subscription, your plan remains active until the end of the term. Afterwards, you revert to the Free plan.
faq.a3: Invoices are automatically sent to your email address after each payment. You can also access past invoices via the 'Manage Subscription' button.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express).
faq.q5: How many chatbots can I create?
faq.a5: The number depends on your plan. Free includes 1, Pro includes 5, Business includes 20, and Enterprise offers unlimited chatbots.
faq.q6: Can I use my own domain?
faq.a6: Yes! Business and Enterprise plans include custom domain support for seamless website integration.
faq.a7: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and are GDPR compliant. Your data is never shared with third parties.
faq.a8: Yes! Free plan includes email support, Pro has priority support, and Business/Enterprise plans include 24/7 dedicated support.

responses.visa:
üõÇ **Student Visa Consulting**

Which country are you interested in for visa information? Popular destinations:

‚Ä¢ **USA (F-1 Visa)** - $350 fee, 2-8 weeks processing
‚Ä¢ **UK (Student Visa)** - ¬£348 fee, 3-8 weeks processing
‚Ä¢ **Germany (National Visa)** - ‚Ç¨75 fee, 4-8 weeks processing
‚Ä¢ **Canada (Study Permit)** - CAD $150 fee, 4-12 weeks processing

üí° **General requirements:** Acceptance letter, proof of financial means, language proficiency certificate, health insurance

Register for full access to our visa guide!
responses.language:
üó£Ô∏è **Language School Recommendations**

Suitable language schools for you:

‚Ä¢ **EF Education First** - Campuses in 50+ countries, $300-500/week
‚Ä¢ **Kaplan International** - English expert, $350-450/week
‚Ä¢ **EC English** - Affordable in Malta, $250-350/week
‚Ä¢ **ILAC Canada** - University pathway programs, $300-400/week

üéØ **Popular destinations:**
- London, New York (Premium)
- Malta, Dublin (Affordable)
- Toronto, Sydney (Quality)

We have 150+ schools in our full database. Register to see all options!
responses.scholarships:
üí∞ **Scholarship Opportunities**

Scholarships suitable for you:

‚Ä¢ **Chevening Scholarship** (UK) - Full scholarship
‚Ä¢ **DAAD Scholarship** (Germany) - ‚Ç¨850/month + fees
‚Ä¢ **Erasmus+** (Europe) - 3-12 month exchange
‚Ä¢ **Fulbright** (USA) - Graduate full scholarship

üéì **Application criteria:**
- Minimum 3.0 GPA
- IELTS 6.5+ or TOEFL 80+
- Statement of purpose
- Recommendation letters

Access our detailed scholarship database with 500+ opportunities via Premium membership!
responses.university:
üéì **University Application Guide**

For overseas university applications:

**üìã Required Documents:**
- Transcript (notarized)
- Diploma/graduation certificate
- Language proficiency certificate (IELTS/TOEFL)
- Statement of purpose (SOP)
- Recommendation letters (2-3)
- CV/Resume

**‚è∞ Application Timeline:**
- September-November: Fall intake
- December-February: Spring intake

**üí° Tips:**
- Start early (6-8 months in advance)
- Apply to multiple universities
- Have a backup plan

Access our university database with Premium membership!

I can help you with:

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: PylonChat is an AI-powered customer engagement platform that helps businesses automate support, increase sales, and provide 24/7 assistance.
intro.howItWorksText: Unlike traditional chatbots that rely on rigid decision trees, PylonChat uses advanced Large Language Models (LLMs) to understand intent and context. This allows it to handle complex queries, switch topics naturally, and provide personalized responses.
intro.step3: Embed the widget on your site

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Welcome to PylonChat. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy.
privacy.collectText: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when registering at the Services.
privacy.useText: We use personal information collected via our Services for business purposes.
privacy.shareText: We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, or to provide services.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.agreementText: These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement made between you and PylonChat.
terms.userText: By using the Site, you represent and warrant that all registration information you submit will be true, accurate, current, and complete.
terms.prohibitedText: You may not access or use the Site for any purpose other than that for which we make the Site available.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.whatText: As is common practice with almost all professional websites this site uses cookies to improve your experience.
cookies.howText: We use cookies for a variety of reasons detailed below. Unfortunately in most cases there are no industry standard options for disabling cookies.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.rightsText: PylonChat is committed to ensuring that your privacy is protected and that we are compliant with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
gdpr.processingText: We process your data only as necessary to provide our services, improve our platform, and comply with legal obligations.
